sourceMeaningMnemonic: You weave <radical>gold</radical> and <radical>white</radical> patterns into this <radical>towel</radical>, turning it into <kanji>brocade</kanji>. It's beautiful, elegant, and worth way more than when it was just a plain towel.
meaningInfo: Imagine weaving this beautiful brocade fabric out of one of your old towels. Try to actually picture the gold and white patterns you want on there. If you're a crafter, actually do it!
readingMnemonic: You want to keep your <kanji>brocade</kanji> fabrics safe, so you lock them away and seal them in with a <reading>niche key</reading> (<ja>にしき</ja>). It's niche because brocade is a very niche kind of thing.
readingInfo: Imagine using your niche key to open this hidden brocade storage room. The key is gold and white and looks like brocade too!
